text: Reinaldo de las Mercedes Pared Pérez (25 September 1956 – 28 October 2021) was a Dominican politician. He represented Distrito Nacional in Chamber of Deputies from 1998 to 2002. He was in the Senate from 2006 until his death. Pared Pérez was president of the senate twice, between 2006 and 2014, and again between 2016 and 2020. He was a member of the Dominican Liberation Party. Pérez killed himself on 28 October 2021, at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Suicides Category:Dominican Republic politicians
title: Reinaldo Pared Pérez
